contentrichtext.text: '''Frank Richards''' may refer to: *[[Frank "Cannonball" Richards]], vaudeville performer *the pseudonym of [[Charles Hamilton (writer)]] (1876-1961), writer of the Billy Bunter stories *the name (after adoption) of [[Francis Philip Woodruff]] (1883-1961), World War I soldier and author *[[Frank Richards (football manager)]] (c. 1880–1963), manager of English football clubs *[[Frank Richards (actor)]] (1909–1992), American actor ==See also== *[[Franklin Richards (disambiguation)]] *[[Francis Richards (disambiguation)]] {{hndis|name = Richards, Frank}}
